Description.Text: New Baku Hotel is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of Baku. Highlights include a gym, sauna, free Wi-Fi, two international restaurants and a bar. Nasmini is a busy business district situated north of the city centre and featuring a cluster of schools and universities. Nearby places of interest include Baku Hippodrom and Tofig Bakhramov football stadium. 20 Yanvar metro station provides fast and easy access to other popular Baku destinations. The hotel is housed in a contemporary building with a sleek facade featuring tinted glass. Facilities include a gym and a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a modern style with neutral tones. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, mini-bar, safe, air-conditioning and an en-suite bathroom. The Modern restaurant offers international cuisine in a bright space, while the al-fresco Terrace restaurant offers national and international dishes. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks at the friendly hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service. Chargeable parking is possible nearby.
